Package it.polimi.ingsw.network.socket

Class SocketEndpoint<RequestIn extends Message>

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.ingsw.network.socket.SocketEndpoint<RequestIn>
  • Type Parameters:
    RequestIn - Type of incoming request message.
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Closeable, java.lang.AutoCloseable, java.lang.Runnable
    public class SocketEndpoint<RequestIn extends Message>
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Closeable, java.lang.Runnable
    Generic Json Socket endpoint. This class is thread-safe. This class provides a mechanism to send a request and wait for the corresponding response. When a new request is read from the socket (a request is a message which is not a response) a callback is called.

      • sendAndWaitResponse

        public <T extends Message> T sendAndWaitResponse​(Message req,
                                                 java.lang.Class<T> outClass)
                                          throws java.io.IOException,
                                                 java.lang.InterruptedException
        Send a request and wait for the corresponding response. A response is an incoming message with the same UUID of this request.
        Type Parameters:
        T - Type of incoming response
        Parameters:
        req - Request to be sent
        outClass - Class of incoming response.
        Returns:
        Response corresponding to given request.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If something goes wrong.
        java.lang.InterruptedException - if the request is interrupted.

      • receive

        public Message receive()
                throws java.io.IOException
        Read a message from the socket. If the message is STOP_MESSAGE the endpoint is closed.
        Returns:
        Message read from socket.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If there are errors while reading the message.
